column1: Little Goat Diner////I don't think I'd go here for dinner
column2: but GREAT for a Sunday meal.  Definitely a menu that everyone will love.  I took my younger brother (college age)
column4: aunt and grandmother here and there
column5: and there wasn't one person who wasn't happy with their meal.   Much like Girl and the Goat
column6: I think the best way to experience the menu is to share everything so you get to order
